person_say: I’ve been procrastinating on my report and don’t know how to start. Are there any ways to improve my efficiency?
animal_say: Oh, I hear you loud and clear! There’s a busy bee named Bizy who specializes in procrastination and time management. Would you like to meet her? She’ll be buzzing with tips to help you get started!

person_say: No thanks, I don't need to meet another bee or hear their buzzing tips. I'll figure it out my own way.
animal_say: I totally understand! Sometimes you just need to dive in. Try breaking your report into smaller sections, set a timer for focused work, and reward yourself once you complete each part. You've got this!
